about_the_game:
The Pope receives many letters from eminent cardinals, loudmouth politicians, or ordinary disciples looking for compassion. You are his secretary; it is your job to decide which letters deserve the Pope’s attention. You will use the Church’s bespoke operating system, Holy OS, and navigate political and ethical dilemmas.

  • Follow the protocol by stamping and signing each letter

  • Decide whether to share a letter with the Pope or trash it

  • Chat with His Holiness, his advisors, and other shady characters

  • Earn money and upgrade your operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
